00044 #define CRLF "\r\n"
00045 #define HTTPVERSION "1.1"

00047 char rawbuf[1024*1024];
00048 
00049 static void
00050 printraw(char *p, int n)
00051 {
00052     int i, l;
00053     while (n > 0) {
00054         l = (n > 40 ? 40 : n);
00055         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
00056             printf(" %c", (' ' <= p[i] && p[i] <= '~') ? p[i] : '.');
00057         printf("\n");
00058         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
00059             printf("%02X", (unsigned char)p[i]);
00060         printf("\n");
00061         p += l;
00062         n -= l;
00063     }
00064 }
00065 
00066 static int
00067 open_local(struct sockaddr_un *sa, const char *verb)
00068 {
00069     int sock;
00070     int res;
00071     
00072     sock = socket(AF_UNIX, SOCK_STREAM, 0);
00073     if (sock == -1) {
00074         perror("socket");
00075         exit(1);
00076     }
00077     res = connect(sock, (struct sockaddr *)sa, sizeof(*sa));
00078     if (res == -1 && errno == ENOENT) {
00079         /* Don't wait for startup just to shut it down */
00080         if (verb != NULL && 0 == strcmp(verb, "kill"))
00081             exit(1);
00082         /* Retry after a delay in case ccnd was just starting up. */
00083         sleep(1);
00084         res = connect(sock, (struct sockaddr *)sa, sizeof(*sa));
00085     }
00086     if (res == -1) {
00087         perror((char *)sa->sun_path);
00088         exit(1);
00089     }
00090     return(sock);
00091 }
00092 
00093 static int
00094 open_socket(const char *host, const char *portstr, int sock_type)
00095 {
00096     int res;
00097     int sock = 0;
00098     char canonical_remote[NI_MAXHOST] = "";
00099     struct addrinfo *addrinfo = NULL;
00100     struct addrinfo *myai = NULL;
00101     struct addrinfo hints = {0};
00102     
00103     if (portstr == NULL || portstr[0] == 0)
00104         portstr = CCN_DEFAULT_UNICAST_PORT;
00105     hints.ai_family = AF_UNSPEC;
00106     hints.ai_socktype = sock_type;
00107     hints.ai_flags = 0;
00108 #ifdef AI_ADDRCONFIG
00109     hints.ai_flags |= AI_ADDRCONFIG;
00110 #endif
00111 #ifdef AI_NUMERICSERV
00112     hints.ai_flags |= AI_NUMERICSERV;
00113 #endif
00114     res = getaddrinfo(host, portstr, &hints, &addrinfo);
00115     if (res != 0 || addrinfo == NULL) {
00116         fprintf(stderr, "getaddrinfo(\"%s\", \"%s\", ...): %s\n",
00117                 host, portstr, gai_strerror(res));
00118         exit(1);
00119     }
00120     
00121     res = getnameinfo(addrinfo->ai_addr, addrinfo->ai_addrlen,
00122                       canonical_remote, sizeof(canonical_remote), NULL, 0, 0);
00123     
00124     sock = socket(addrinfo->ai_family, addrinfo->ai_socktype, 0);
00125     if (sock == -1) {
00126         perror("socket");
00127         exit(1);
00128     }
00129     hints.ai_family = addrinfo->ai_family;
00130     hints.ai_flags = AI_PASSIVE;
00131 #ifdef AI_NUMERICSERV
00132     hints.ai_flags |= AI_NUMERICSERV;
00133 #endif
00134     res = getaddrinfo(NULL, NULL, &hints, &myai);
00135     if (myai != NULL) {
00136         res = bind(sock, (struct sockaddr *)myai->ai_addr, myai->ai_addrlen);
00137         if (res == -1) {
00138             perror("bind");
00139             exit(1);
00140         }
00141     }
00142     res = connect(sock, (struct sockaddr *)addrinfo->ai_addr, addrinfo->ai_addrlen);
00143     if (res == -1) {
00144         perror(canonical_remote);
00145         exit(1);
00146     }
00147     freeaddrinfo(addrinfo);
00148     if (myai != NULL)
00149         freeaddrinfo(myai);
00150     return (sock);
00151 }
00152 
00153 static void
00154 send_ccnb_file(int sock, FILE *msgs, const char *filename, int is_dgram)
00155 {
00156     ssize_t rawlen;
00157     ssize_t sres;
00158     int fd = 0;
00159     int truncated = 0;
00160     char onemore[1] = {0};
00161     
00162     if (strcmp(filename, "-") != 0) {
00163         fd = open(filename, O_RDONLY);
00164         if (fd == -1) {
00165             perror(filename);
00166             exit(-1);
00167         }
00168     }
00169     for (;;) {
00170         rawlen = read(fd, rawbuf, sizeof(rawbuf));
00171         if (rawlen == -1) {
00172             perror(filename);
00173             exit(-1);
00174         }
00175         if (rawlen == 0 && !is_dgram)
00176             break;
00177         if (is_dgram && rawlen == sizeof(rawbuf))
00178             truncated = read(fd, onemore, 1);
00179         if (truncated == 1)
00180             fprintf(msgs, "TRUNCATED ");
00181         fprintf(msgs, "send %s (%lu bytes)\n", filename, (unsigned long)rawlen);
00182         sres = send(sock, rawbuf, rawlen, 0);
00183         if (sres == -1) {
00184             perror("send");
00185             exit(1);
00186         }
00187         if (is_dgram)
00188             break;
00189     }
00190     if (fd != 0)
00191         close(fd);
00192 }
00193 
00194 static int
00195 is_ccnb_name(const char *s)
00196 {
00197     size_t len = strlen(s);
00198     return (len > 5 && 0 == strcasecmp(s + len - 5, ".ccnb"));
00199 }
00200 
00201 void
00202 write_to_stream(FILE *outstream, const void *rawbuf, size_t rawlen)
00203 {
00204     size_t wlen;
00205     wlen = fwrite(rawbuf, 1, rawlen, outstream);
00206     if (wlen != rawlen)
00207         fprintf(stderr, "short write (%ld of %ld)\n",
00208                 (long)wlen, (long)rawlen);
00209     if (fflush(outstream) != 0)
00210         perror("fflush");
00211 }
00212 
00213 int
00214 main(int argc, char **argv)
00215 {
00216     struct sockaddr_un addr = {0};
00217     int opt;
00218     struct pollfd fds[1];
00219     int res;
00220     ssize_t rawlen;
00221     ssize_t wlen;
00222     int sock;
00223     char *filename = NULL;
00224     const char *portstr;
00225     int msec = 1000;
00226     int argp;
00227     FILE *msgs = stdout;
00228     FILE *outstream = NULL;
00229     int udp = 0;
00230     int tcp = 0;
00231     int recvloop = 0;
00232     int do_pclose = 0;
00233     const char *host = "localhost";
00234     const char *cmd = NULL;
00235 
00236     while ((opt = getopt(argc, argv, "bht:T:u:")) != -1) {
00237         switch (opt) {
00238             case 'b':
00239                 outstream = stdout;
00240                 msgs = stderr;
00241                 break;
00242             case 't':
00243                 msec = atoi(optarg);
00244                 break;
00245             case 'u':
00246                 udp = 1;
00247                 host = optarg;
00248                 break;
00249             case 'T':
00250                 tcp = 1;
00251                 host = optarg;
00252                 break;
00253             case 'h':
00254             default:
00255                 fprintf(stderr, "Usage %s %s\n", argv[0],
00256                         " [-b(inaryout)] "
00257                         " [-u udphost] "
00258                         " [-T tcphost] "
00259                         " [-t millisconds] "
00260                         " ( send <filename>"
00261                         " | <sendfilename>.ccnb"
00262                         " | recv"
00263                         " | kill"
00264                         " | status [-x]"
00265                         " | timeo <millisconds>"
00266                         " ) ...");
00267                 exit(1);
00268         }
00269     }
00270     argp = optind;
00271     portstr = getenv(CCN_LOCAL_PORT_ENVNAME);
00272     ccn_setup_sockaddr_un(portstr, &addr);
00273     if (udp)
00274         sock = open_socket(host, portstr, SOCK_DGRAM);
00275     else if (tcp)
00276         sock = open_socket(host, portstr, SOCK_STREAM);
00277     else
00278         sock = open_local(&addr, argv[optind]);
00279     fds[0].fd = sock;
00280     fds[0].events = POLLIN;
00281     fds[0].revents = 0;
00282     for (argp = optind; argv[argp] != NULL; argp++) {
00283         if (0 == strcmp(argv[argp], "send")) {
00284             filename = argv[argp + 1];
00285             if (filename == NULL)
00286                 filename = "-";
00287             else
00288                 argp++;
00289             send_ccnb_file(sock, msgs, filename, udp);
00290         }
00291         else if (is_ccnb_name(argv[argp])) {
00292             filename = argv[argp];
00293             send_ccnb_file(sock, msgs, filename, udp);
00294         }
00295         else if (recvloop || 0 == strcmp(argv[argp], "recv")) {
00296             res = poll(fds, 1, msec);
00297             if (res == -1) {
00298                 perror("poll");
00299                 exit(1);
00300             }
00301             if (res == 0) {
00302                 fprintf(msgs, "recv timed out after %d ms\n", msec);
00303                 recvloop = 0;
00304                 continue;
00305             }
00306             rawlen = recv(sock, rawbuf, sizeof(rawbuf), 0);
00307             if (rawlen == -1) {
00308                 perror("recv");
00309                 exit(1);
00310             }
00311             if (rawlen == 0)
00312                 break;
00313             if (recvloop)
00314                 argp--;
00315             else
00316                 fprintf(msgs, "recv of %lu bytes\n", (unsigned long)rawlen);
00317             if (outstream != NULL)
00318                 write_to_stream(outstream, rawbuf, rawlen);
00319             else
00320                 printraw(rawbuf, rawlen);
00321         }
00322         else if (0 == strcmp(argv[argp], "kill")) {
00323             poll(fds, 1, 1);
00324             res = unlink((char *)addr.sun_path);
00325             if (res == 0) {
00326                 res = open_socket(host, portstr, SOCK_STREAM);
00327                 if (res != -1) {
00328                     wlen = write(res, " ", 1);
00329                     close(res);
00330                 }
00331                 poll(fds, 1, 5000);
00332                 rawlen = recv(sock, rawbuf, sizeof(rawbuf), 0);
00333                 if (rawlen == 0)
00334                     exit(0);
00335                 if (rawlen > 0)
00336                     exit(2);
00337             }
00338             fprintf(stderr, "%s kill (%s) ", argv[0], (char *)addr.sun_path);
00339             perror("failed");
00340             exit(1);
00341         }
00342         else if (0 == strcmp(argv[argp], "timeo")) {
00343             if (argv[argp + 1] != NULL)
00344                 msec = atoi(argv[++argp]);
00345         }
00346         else if (udp == 0 && 0 == strcmp(argv[argp], "status")) {
00347             msgs = stderr;
00348             if ((argv[argp + 1] != NULL) && (0 == strcmp(argv[argp + 1], "-x"))) {
00349                 argp++;
00350                 cmd = ("tail -n +6");
00351                 outstream = popen(cmd, "w");
00352                 wlen = send(sock, "GET /?f=xml " HTTPVERSION CRLF , 14, 0);
00353             } else {
00354                 cmd = ("sed -e 's=[<]style .*/style[>]==g' -e 's=[<][^>]*[>]==g'|"
00355                    "tail -n +7");
00356                 outstream = popen(cmd, "w");
00357                 wlen = send(sock, "GET / " HTTPVERSION CRLF , 8, 0);
00358             }
00359 
00360             recvloop = 1;
00361             do_pclose = 1;
00362             argp--;
00363         }
00364         else {
00365             fprintf(stderr, "%s: unknown verb %s, try -h switch for usage\n",
00366                     argv[0], argv[argp]);
00367             exit(1);
00368         }
00369     }
00370     if (do_pclose)
00371         pclose(outstream);
00372     exit(0);
00373 }
